text: Respiratory viruses were detected in 7 of 32 (21.9 %) cases, with predominance of respiratory syncytial virus (RSV) ( Table 2 ). In 3 of 32 (9.4 %) cases the respiratory virus was the sole pathogen detected ( Table 2) . Mycoplasma pneumoniae was detected in 1 of 19 cases, in a mixed infection with H. influenzae (Table 2) .
